name: agentkeepalive

scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test-cov
npm run lint && npm run test-cov
npm run lint && npm run test-cov
npm run lint && npm run test-cov

scripts.test-cov: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -t 5000 -r should-http test/*.test.js
scripts.test-travis: node node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -t 5000 -r should-http test/*.test.js
